title: 06/09/21 DPS Hour 3 Fernando Tatis Jr
itunes:title: 06/09/21 DPS Hour 3 Fernando Tatis Jr
description:
Fernando Tatis Jr talks to Dan about his usual day as he gets ready to play on game day. And Dan asks him directly about the "sticky stuff" pitchers are using to increase their spin rate.
